Today, she is asking for a loan with FUSAI to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and brick in order to build a new sink in order to bring improved sanitary conditions to her home.

loans.use: invest in cement, sand, gravel, and brick to build a new sink for her home.

loans.name: Cristina Elizabeth

texts.es: Cristina de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia desde hace 10 años, tiene muchos clientes por la variedad de prodcutos que vende, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hoga, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Christina is 35 years old and lives in her own home with her live-in-boyfriend. She has a small store she runs from her home. She has lived in the same home for 10 years and she has many customers because of the variety of the products she sells. With her earnings she has made from her business she is able to pay for household expenses. Today she is asking for a loan in order to purchase supplies such as eggs, basic grains, sodas, sweets and pastries. The wider variety of stock will help her earn more money, which will help her obtain a higher quality of life.

loans.use: purchase eggs, basic grains, sodas, sweets and pastries.

loans.name: Ernest

texts.en:
Ernest is a proud United States Army Veteran and devoted father. He currently lives in a very modest home as he is a very simple man and likes to live within his means. He shares his home with his daughter and grandchildren who he helps care for and to whom he dedicates much of his time. 

Ernest is very prudent with managing his fixed income and has always tried to keep up his home without relying on credit, however, due to the unusually hot summer this year, his 22-year-old air conditioning unit finally gave out and he will need financing to replace the unit as he does not have the upfront cash to make this investment.
 
While seeking out affordable financing, the temperature inside Ernest’s home has risen above the 90+ degree temperature that’s experienced outdoors during the day. The humidity and heat is not only unbearable, but is also taking a toll on his health. 

Due to Ernest rarely utilizing credit for purchases, he has little credit history and therefore cannot access low interest loans from traditional financing sources such as banks and stores. Ernest is hoping that SELF and Kiva can help him access affordable financing to be able to replace  his old air conditioner and to help him  improve the quality of life and the livability of his home for himself and  his family.

loans.use: to improve the quality of life and the livability of his home by helping him purchase a new air conditioning unit.

loans.name: Stephanie

texts.en:
Stephanie is a strong, loving single mom. She has worked very hard to recover from a difficult divorce that left her with debts that were hard to keep up with while supporting her daughter who is disabled, and herself.  Through Stephanie's optimism and determination, she has managed to find a balance between caring for her child who requires special care, while recovering from her financial distress.   

Stephanie bought a modest home where she wants to stay with her daughter for the rest of her life, however the home is in need of several repairs including a new air conditioner that is critical to the well being of her child and has a great impact on the quality of life that both Stephanie and her daughter can achieve in their home. 

Stephanie has tried to obtain financing through banks, but the payments are too high due to her credit being damaged after her divorce.   Since paying off her debt, Stephanie has had a perfect payment history on all her bills and currently has very little outstanding debt. 

 Stephanie is hoping that Kiva and SELF will help her replace her old air conditioning unit that has become inoperable. Replacing this old unit will greatly improve the living conditions for her daughter and herself as the temperatures in the home are often higher than extreme temperatures outdoors.

loans.use: to improve her family's quality of life and health by allowing her to purchase a new air conditioner for her home.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa is a hard working woman and devoted wife of a United States Veteran. Her husband became disabled due to his time in the service, and is currently unable to work to support his family. During these difficult times, Vanessa has supported her husband without hesitation. 

She has managed to juggle bills as well as create a budget that supports the couple on her income, however initially Vanessa struggled with managing all of their expenses and while she was trying to re-adjust her life, she fell behind on some payments which damaged her credit. Through Vanessa’s strength and determination to support her husband, she was able to find a better job that allows her cover her family’s expenses, pay her bills and give him the care he needs. 

Vanessa’s home has been in need of a new roof for some time now, however, she was unable to obtain affordable financing to make the repairs due to her low credit score.  Vanessa is very concerned that the condition of her roof is going to further damage to her home and also impact the health of her family due to mold growth caused by the water infiltration.

Vanessa is hoping that SELF and Kiva can help her repair her roof to preserve the equity, safety and livability in their home while helping provide a better quality of life for her husband who spends most of his time in the home.

loans.use: to improve her husband's quality of life and the safety of her home by allowing her to purchase a new roof.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is a married woman with five children, three of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees.

She has operated a business of selling local brew for the past six years to the neighbors. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and transportation in her business.

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase a stock of local beer to sell. She decided to join Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of local beer to sell.

loans.name: Theodore

texts.en:
Theodore is a proud United States Air Force Veteran who has experienced some difficult times since his retirement. He lives in a modest home that he tries his best to maintain while keeping his expenses to a minimum. While Theodore has incurred in very little debt throughout the years, after the housing crisis in Florida, he found that his home had no equity and that he owed much more on his mortgage than his home was worth. This prevented Theodore from using his home equity line of credit for emergencies and repairs leaving him without financing options just as he was transitioning into retirement. 

Theodore tried desperately to keep his house up and stay afloat during the housing recession but ultimately the hardships experienced during this time damaged his credit. He has since, been unable to finance much needed home repairs through banks due to the high rates being more than he can afford. He has attempted to save and pay for some repairs out of pocket, but when his air conditioner stopped working this summer, it was much more than he could afford to pay up front.  Theodore is hoping that SELF and Kiva will help him replace his old unit and make his home more livable. Currently, the temperature inside his home surpasses the average 85-90 degrees registering outdoors.
 
Theodore will use his Kiva loan to purchase a new air conditioning unit to improve his quality of life and the livability of his home.

loans.use: to improve his quality of life and comfort by allowing him to purchase a new air conditioning unit for his home.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Francisco con 69 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico,vive junto a su esposa y su hijo, en el distrito de La Peca, provincia de Bagua, departamento de Amazonas,país Perú.Francisco cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Francisco se dedica al Cultivo de café variedad Catimor . El préstamo solicitado lo utilizará para invertir en el mantenimiento y compra de abonos para el cultivo. Esta inversión le permitirá obtener mayores ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.

Francisco es socio recurrente para nuestra institución Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 69, lives in his own home made of rustic materials. He lives with his wife and his son in the district of La Peca, in the province of Bagua, in the Amazon of Peru. Francisco has many good references: personal as well as professional from the people of his region.

Francisco works cultivating Catimor coffee. He is asking for the loan to invest in the maintenance and purchase of fertilizer for the crops. This loan will allow him to have better earnings, thus bettering his economic position. He will be able to invest in a better lifestyle.


Francisco is a recurrent partner with the institution Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to invest in maintenance and the purchase of fertilizer for his crop.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina, de 55 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora, estudio hasta cuarto grado, vive con una nieta, porque sus hijos son mayores de edad y ya formaron su familia, uno de ellos reside en Estados Unidos y el otro vive en la misma comunidad. 

Josefina, se dedica a la crianza de pollos desde hace más de 10 años, después que enviudo comenzó su negocio, pero además de eso también trabaja limpiando casas y para lo cual tiene que desplazarse hasta la ciudad 10 kilómetros y lo realiza 2 veces por semana.  

Josefina, necesita el préstamo para comprar concentrado y vitaminas para los pollos y para comprar cerdos para engordar y vender, de esta manera ella menciona que sus ingresos aumentaran considerablemente.  

A futuro quiere seguir trabajando de la manera que lo está haciendo; también quiere contribuir con la crianza de sus nietos y verlos crecer.
texts.en:
Josefina is a 55 year old hard-working woman. She went to school up to the fourth grade. She lives with a granddaughter because her sons are older and have already formed their own families. One of them lives in the United States and the other lives in the same community.

Josefina makes a living raising chickens. She has done this for more than 10 years. After she became a widow she started her business, but in addition to that she also works cleaning houses for which she needs to travel 10 kilometers to the city and does so 2 times per week.

Josefina needs the loan to buy feed concentrate and vitamins for the chickens and to buy pigs to fatten and sell. She states that in this way her income will increase considerably.

In the future, she wants to continue working in the same way she is now. She also wants to contribute in the upbringing of her grandchildren and watch them grow.

loans.use: to buy feed concentrate and vitamins for the chickens and to buy pigs to fatten and sell.

loans.name: Shida

texts.en:
Shida is a married mother of seven children, four of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food.

For over four years, she has operated an open air food-selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, Irish potatoes and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, Irish potatoes and  cooking fat

loans.name: Lolahon

texts.ru: Лолахон, 49 лет, замужем, есть сын. У нее высшее образование, 15 лет работает медсестрой в Войсковой части, дополнительно работает в Комитете по физкультуре и спорту в должности санитара. Совокупная заработная плата составляет 13,500 сом (KGS). Лолахон решила построить ванную комнату, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 67,000 сом (KGS), на запрошенную сумму Лолахон приобретет трубы, кафель, унитаз и прочие материалы.Свои доходы она планирует вложить в дальнейшее условий проживания ее семьи.
texts.en:
Lolahon is 49 years old, married, and has a son. She has a post-secondary education, and has worked as a nurse in a military unit for 15 years. She does additional work as a medical assistant for the local Committee on Physical Education and Sports. Lolahon's combined salary is 13,500 som (KGS).

Lolahon has decided to build a bathroom, so she applied to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 67,000 som (KGS). With the sum she is requesting, Lolahon will purchase pipes, bricks, a toilet, and other construction materials. She plans to use her income to further improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, pipes, a toilet, and other materials for building a bathroom.

loans.name: Orfa Merary

texts.es:
Orfa, de 42 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado, vive con su hija y actualmente está soltera . 
		
Orfa, tiene negocio de venta de cócteles de curiles, ceviche de camarón y ceviche de caracol, este trabajo ha desempeñado desde hace 20 años.

El crédito lo solicita para comprar más mariscos para su negocio, porque sus clientes han aumentado y ella necesita poder aumentar más su mercadería para poder satisfacer las necesidades de ellos. 

Los planes de Orfa, son seguir creciendo en su negocio y tener una buena calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Orfa, age 42, studied through fourth grade. She lives with her daughter and presently she is single.

Orfa has a business selling shellfish cocktail, shrimp ceviche and sea snail ceviche. She has been doing this for 20 years.

She is asking for the loan to purchase more shellfish for her business. She has more clients and she needs to increase her merchandise to satisfy the demand of her customers. Orfa plans to continue growing her business and have a good quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more shellfish for her business.

loans.name: Run's Group

texts.en:
Run’s group lives in a rural village in Kampong Thom province, in Cambodia.

Run makes a living cultivating rice to support her family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean, drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Sath's Grouo Group

texts.en:
Sath’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sath makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. I

n their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sokhy's Group

texts.en:
Sokhy’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sokhy makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family. I

n their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Nhak's Group

texts.en:
Nhak’s Group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province, in Cambodia.

Nhak works as farmer to support her family.

In their village, there is no reliable access to safe, clean, drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses, and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Pheap's Group

texts.en:
Pheap’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Pheap makes a living cultivating rice to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Iulai

texts.en:
Iulai is a 60-year-old mother with 5 childre. She runs and operates a business selling pancakes, buns, and pork cakes in her community.

Iulai requested for a loan to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, a bottle of vegetable oil and plastic bags, to assist her in running the business.

She will use her profit to expand her business.

She became a member of SPBD in 2010.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, a sack of sugar, yeast, a frying pan, a wooden spoon, a bottle of vegetable oil and plastic bags.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida was born in 1968. She is married and has 2 children. Her children are smart and Farida loves her children very much. Her husband is a migrant from Russia.

Farida is an entrepreneur. She has been busy buying and selling foods in a local market for more than 7 years. She has a great deal of experience in this field.

Farida has been ill for several years. She has no money to treat herself as she is the main source of income for her family, Farida is asking for a loan of 7500 Somoni to pay for her medical treatments.

She awaits your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for her medical treatments.

loans.name: Rosa Evangelina

texts.es:
Rosa, de 26 años de edad, está acompañada y vive con su esposo, el cual se dedica a la agricultura, uno de sus hijos estudia y el otro aún no.

Rosa, trabaja junto a su esposo en la agricultura desde hace varios años, ellos poseen una parcela con cultivos agrícolas ha  unos 3 kilográmetros de su casa.

Rosa, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abono, porque los cultivos lo necesitan paro poder dar una muy buena cosecha.

Rosa, sueña con obtener muy buenas cosechas, ya que es la única fuente de ingresos y así poder tener una calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 26, lives with her husband, who works in agriculture. One of their children studies, the other doesn't yet.


Rosa has worked with her husband in agriculture for many years. They have a parcel of land with agricultural crops just three kilometers from their house.


Rosa needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer because the crops need it to have a good harvest.


Rosa dreams of having good harvests, as this is the only source of income. This way she can have a good life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizer.

loans.name: Thorn's Group

texts.en:
Thorn’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Thorn makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as seller and teacher to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Kum's Group

texts.en:
Kum’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Kum makes a living cultivating rice to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Sokhum's Group

texts.en:
Sokhum’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Sokhum makes a living cultivating rice to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Hong's Group

texts.en:
Hong’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Hong makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a seller to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Vaoau

texts.en:
Vaoau is a 31-year-old mother with 4 children. She runs a business of providing transportation services to people. She has been doing this for more than a year.

Vaoau requested for a loan to buy new wheels, paint color, a car seat, and an air conditioner, to help her maintain good service.

She will use her profits to buy another taxi and expand her business.

She became a member of SPBD in 2013.

loans.use: to buy new wheels, paint color, a car seat, and an air conditioner.

loans.name: Purevsuren

texts.en:
Purevsuren, 57 years old, lives with his wife and granddaughter in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been transporting people between districts using his minivan since 2004, and his wife works as the conductor on his minivan. This year his 8th grade student granddaughter came to live in their house, located near a high school. Using his previous loan, he renovated his house and created a comfortable home for his family. 

Purevsuren is requesting a loan to repair the fences surrounding his land. The fences became damaged, and many stray animals such as dogs and cattle are crossing his land and eating his growing vegetables. The fence repairs will solve this problem.

loans.use: to repair fences surrounding his land to prevent stray animals from eating his vegetable garden

loans.name: Talaitupu

texts.en:
Talaitupu is 27 years old and married with 2 children. She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living with the help of her husband. She has been doing this for more than a year.

Talaitupu has requested for a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, taro roots (seedlings), a backpack sprayer, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel, fertilizers, and banana tube (seedlings), to assist her in running the business.

She joined SPBD in 2013, and she will use her business profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, taro roots (seedlings), a backpack sprayer, hand gloves, a rake, a shovel, fertilizers, and banana tube (seedlings).

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Con 39 años de edad María se dedica a la venta de ropa interior de forma ambulante y los fines de semana en las tardes vende tamales de gallina lo que le permite obtener mejores ingresos y sostener a su familia. María vive en casa de su propiedad desde hace 8 años junto a sus 3 hijos y su compañero de vida y es con el apoyo de él que logra enviar sus hijos a estudiar buscando que tengan una mejor calidad de vida. María logro instalar energía eléctrica en su vivienda con el apoyo del crédito anterior por lo que solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, puertas y ventanas para instalar puertas y ventanas en su vivienda y de esta manera brindar mayor protección a su familia.
texts.en:
María, 39, sells underwear as a street vendor and on the weekend afternoons she sells chicken tamales. This allows her to have a better income to support her family.

For the past 8 years María has lived in her own home with her three children and her partner.

With his support they are able to send their children to school allowing them to have a better quality of life.

With her last loan, María was able to install electricity in her house. She is requesting a new loan from FUSAI to invest in: cement, sand, doors and windows in order to install doors and windows in her house. This will allow her to keep her family safer.

loans.use: to invest in: cement, sand, doors and windows in order to install doors and windows in her house. This will allow her to keep her family safe.

loans.name: Arturo Ii

texts.en:
Arturo is a 36-year-old man from Calape, Bohol. He earned a living by doing the hog raising business. He has been doing this for almost five years. His wife also works as a cashier to have extra income to provide the needs of their children. They have two children to raise ages eight and six years old.

Arturo is taking a loan to buy feed and for business capital. He is planning to start other business to increase their earnings so that in the future he has enough money to send his two children in college. Hence, he said he plans in the future to improve his business for his children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy feed for his pigs

loans.name: Rhodora

texts.en:
Rhodora is a 43-year-old woman from Ajuy, Iloilo. She is married and has two children, who are ages 20 and 10 years old.

Rhodora and her husband run a fishing business to earn a living. They have been doing this for almost eight years. They work together to provide the needs of their children. Thus in the future, Rhodora wants to send both of her children to school and see them finish a degree. 

She is asking for a loan to buy a fish trap known as “bubo” to have good catches. She will also buy a fishing net and gasoline for their boat

loans.use: to buy a "bubo" fish trap, fishing net, and gasoline

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Her name is Teresita, aged 59, widow, from the island of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Her being a widow is her biggest challenge in life but with faith and diligence she came out of it victorious raising her children well some of whom have already their own families. She is now sending her youngest to college.

She is thankful that she learned about CCT that helped her strengthen her faith in God. She trusts that through Kiva she can access financial assistance of a Php 15000 to fill her mini-store with essential food and household items and sells them at retail price. She sells dry, and packaged commodities directly to consumers. Her store means a lot to her for this is where she source funds for their daily needs.

She dreams of having a big grocery store someday and of course to see her youngest finish college to allow her a better future. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for groceries, toiletries and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Hend

texts.en:
Hend is a 30 year old mother of two children; her husband is working with low income.

Hend wants to use her free time in doing something useful, so she decided to be a productive woman and help her husband with the household expenses. She started to sell household supplies. When she felt that her efforts were working well and she was earning a good income from this work, she decided to expand her work. Therefore she has applied for a loan to help develop her work and to buy more kinds of products to sell and increase her income.

loans.use: to help develop her work and to buy more kinds of products to sell and increase her income.

loans.name: Heba

texts.en:
Heba, 31 years old and a mother of five children and lives in one of the underprivileged areas in Jordan where she and her husband struggle to make a living. She started her own business by bringing some women’s clothing items that goes with people taste in the area and sells it from her home and by knocking on neighborhood’s houses to promote the goods and sell. She is really working hard to help her husband in the household expenses and in educate her children. 
now she is applying for a loan to buy more clothes and new kinds of products to sell and increase her income.
Heba needs your support.

loans.use: to buy new products and clothes to sell

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a young married woman with two children, so she carried the responsible early. Asmaa's husband is working in his own business, which is a small car repair shop and she is working hard to help and support him.

She is conservative woman and asked her husband to take her place in the photo.
She is very ambitious woman and wants to improve the standards of living for her family and she believes in her husband, therefore she has been started taking loans to help him, to develop his shop. After her husband became known in this field and has experience she decided to expand and develop her business.

She decided to take a loan help him cover his purchase for tools and equipment and increase his incomes and improve the standards of living for the family.

loans.use: to buy oil, tools and equipment for her husband's car repair shop

loans.name: Encarnación

texts.es:
Encarnación, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, está casado, su esposa trabaja como empleada en una alcaldía municipal, tienen dos hijos adolescentes que asisten a la escuela.

Encarnación, desde hace quince años tiene una pequeña tienda, en donde vende productos de primera necesidad, se ha dedicado ha este negocio con el propósito de ayudarle a su esposa a obtener más ingresos, vende todos los días de lunes a domingo.
 
Encarnación, está solicitando el préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio y comprar más frijoles, papel higiénico, aceite, maíz y otros productos que sus clientes buscan más, de esa manera lograra mejor su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

El sueño de Encarnación, es que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Encarnacion, 45 years old, studied through sixth grade and is married.  His wife works as a clerk with the municipal government.  They have two teenage children who attend school.

For fifteen years Encarnacion has had a small shop, where he sells all kinds of products.  He has worked in this business with the goal of helping out his wife to increase their earnings.  He sells every day from Monday to Sunday.
 
Encarnacion is requesting the loan to invest in his business and purchase more beans, toilet paper, oil, corn and other products that customers search for and in this way he will be able to better his quality of life and that of his family.

Encarnacion's dream is that his children become professionals.

loans.use: to invest in his business and purchase more beans, toilet paper, oil, corn and other products that customers search for

loans.name: Yessenia Bersely

texts.es:
Yessenia, de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato y tiene una especialidad en cosmetología, está acompañada, tiene 2 hijos, su pareja se dedica a la venta de agua empacada en centros educativo de la zona del municipio.

Yessenia, se dedica al comercio o distribución de productos para diferentes salas de belleza, dicha actividad la ejerce desde hace 7 años, ella fue propietaria de una sala de bellezas pero uno de los proveedores de productos, le propuso la oferta de surtir a los clientes que él tenía y fue así como ella comenzó a conocer dicha labor y en la actualidad la conoce muy bien; ella aún tiene esperanzas de restablecer su nuevo local de salón de belleza ya que en la zona donde reside, no existe ningún servicio de esa naturaleza, ella pretende atenderlo con el apoyo de su hermana que conoce muy bien dicha actividad también.
 
Yessenia, necesita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza y prendas de acero, dichos productos son para ampliación de su negocio.

Yessenia, desea obtener un negocio que le permita llenar las necesidades de sus clientes y que le sea rentable para la sostenibilidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Yessenia is 29 years old, she graduated high school, and she has an education in cosmetology. She has a boyfriend and two children. Her partner sells bottled water at education centers in the urban zone of the city.

Yessenia works distributing supplies to different beauty salons. She has done this for seven years. She started her career owning her own salon, but one of her suppliers offered her the opportunity to work for him supplying his contacts. And so, she made a change of career and she has now gained expertise in her new job. She has hopes of opening a new beauty salon since in the neighborhood where she lives there are currently no businesses of this sort. She plans to run her new store with her sister who also works in cosmetology.

Yessenis needs a loan in order to purchase beauty products and hair pins in order to launch her new business.

Yessenia wants to have a business that allows her to fulfill the needs of her clients and one that will bring in a steady income so she can support her family.

loans.use: purchase beauty products.

loans.name: Ana Lilian

texts.es:
Ana, de 30 años de edad, solo estudio hasta noveno grado, posteriormente se dedico a estudiar cosmetología, está soltera y vive solo con su pequeño hijo y su padre.

Ana, posee una pequeña sala de belleza en donde también vende productos para el cabello y otros productos de uso personal, ella tiene el salón de belleza en su casa y el horario de atención es todos los días de 8:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m.

Ana, necesita el crédito para comprar más productos para vender, ya que sus productos se venden mucho y surtiendo su negocio los clientes comprarán siempre en su negocio.

Ana, sueña con un salón de belleza más amplio y que sea el mejor de la ciudad; también sueña con ver crecer a su pequeño hijo y que se convierta en un profesional.
texts.en:
Ana, age 30, only studied through the ninth grade. Then she studied cosmetology. She is single and lives with her young son and her father.


Ana has a small beauty salon where she also sells hair products and other personal care products. She has the beauty salon in her home and works from 8:00a.m. until 6:00 p.m.


Ana needs the loan to purchase more products to sell because her products sell well and if she replenishes her business, the clients will continue to buy from her.

Ana dreams of having a larger beauty salon, and one that is the best in the city. She also dreams of seeing her son grow up and become a professional.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products to sell.

loans.name: Irma Lorena

texts.es:
Irma, de 26 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, vive aún con sus padres y son una familia muy unida, está soltera y no tiene hijos.

Irma, tiene un comedor que tiene por nombre “Comedor Lorena”, ella tiene ese comedor desde hace 8 años y lo administra junto a su mamá.					

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar insumos para preparar los alimentos y para adecuar un poco más el lugar. 

El sueño de ella es que su negocio pueda crecer y tener su propia familia.
texts.en:
Irma, 26, studied up to 9th grade. She still lives with her parents and they are a very close family. She is single and has no children.

Irma owns a canteen named "Lorena's Canteen". She has owned this canteen for the past 8 years and runs it with her mom.

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies to prepare the meals and to fix up the place a little bit.

Her dream is to grow her business and have her own family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare the meals and to fix up the place a little bit.

loans.name: Yasir

texts.en:
Yasir is 35 years old and lives in the area of Wazirabad, Pakistan. He is a responsible father of three children. He has been running a small shop in which he sells cosmetic products and gift items. He contributes his full income to household expenses. He always tries to establish his business by offering the latest cosmetic products and new designed gift items. Nowadays the latest cosmetic products introduced in the market are very much in demand and expensive as well.

Moreover, Yasir also wants to introduce new gift items like decoration pieces, sceneries, wall clocks, ladies handbags, wristwatches, jewelry, etc.

Yasir requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan. He will use the full amount to buy the latest cosmetic products and latest gift items. He hopes that with this amount he will be able to enhance the business.

Yasir is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and gift items for his own shop

loans.name: Maa Bramhanei Shg-B Group

texts.en: Bisnupriya is a 50-year-old divorcee standing to the extreme left in the photograph. She hails from a small village of Salepur, Odisha, India. Her life took a different turn after her husband left her. All the burdens of her family came to her shoulders. But she never broke; she was always rock strong in order to move on and lead a happy life with her daughter. Bisnupriya is currently engaged in making clay pots for sale and works very hard in order to meet the household needs. However, due to a lack of financial resources, Bisnupriya is unable to provide a higher education to her only daughter. She, along with her other group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR. Bisnupriya will use her portion of the loan amount to pay the course fees for her daughter's ITI course. The loan amount will help her daughter to pursue her higher education smoothly and efficiently and will help her get a job in a reputed company. Bisnupriya is in need of your kind help.

loans.use: to pay the course fees for her daughter's ITI course.

loans.name: Asifa

texts.en:
ASIFA is 31-year-old lady, living with her spouse and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.
She wants to make some savings so that she can provide better living facilities to her children, but it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.
Her husband has been driving a rickshaw for several years. His income is insufficient to feed his entire family. He has to maintain the rickshaw, but he does not have sufficient cash in hand to fix the problem.

Therefore, ASIFA has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so her husband can fix his rickshaw and can drive smoothly. She hopes that she would be able to save enough till the time comes for her children to marry in the future.

loans.use: to fix her husband's rickshaw to continue his transportation services.

loans.name: Thy's Group

texts.en:
Thy’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Thy makes a living cultivating rice to support his family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Saren's Group

texts.en:
Saren’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Saren makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work by selling groceries to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of them to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Chreb’s group live in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Chreb makes a living cultivating rice to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: To buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family.

loans.name: Yit's Group

texts.en:
Yit’s group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Yit makes a living cultivating rice and raising pigs and she also does extra work as farmer to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Kyon War Village Group

texts.en:
Featured borrower, Hla is 34 years old, married with two children and both of them have secondary education. Hla does crop farming and also raise ducks; to sell eggs and he also raises pigs, for savings. Since, Hla and his wife have years of duck farming experiences, they are always careful to be gentle with their ducks, as it effects the egg production rate.

The loan from Proximity Designs will help Hla's family purchase feeds for both current use and store for the future. He intends to invest revenue from livestock to the field and as well to have developments in all the businesses.

Above are the members from Kyon War Village Group, named Hla, Than, Sein, Ko and Zaw. This loan will help 10 members, expand their duck raising business and purchase high quality feeds. As, to get well cared and balanced feeds are very crucial, duck raisers work hard to raise their birds well.

Kyon War village is located in Myanmar Ayeyarwaddy River, Delta Region. Besides duck farming, for business, families do fishing, tailoring and agricultural productions.

loans.use: to purchase high quality feeds for 10 members to look after their ducks, for good egg production

loans.name: Kakern's Group

texts.en:
Kakern’s Group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Kakern makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a seller to support her family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help both of these women safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family.

loans.name: Mey's Group

texts.en:
Mey’s Group lives in a rural village in Kompong Thom province in Cambodia. Mey makes a living cultivating rice and raising fish and he also does extra work as farmer to support his family.

In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help both of these men safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for his family.

loans.name: Patricia Yessenia

texts.es: Patricia es una mujer trabajadora de 36 años de edad que vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijas de 12 y 15 años de edad. Patricia se dedica a la elaboración de prendas de vestir desde hace 15 años, por lo que cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que solicitan sus servicios. Patricia  desea construir una pila en su vivienda, ya que carece de un lugar adecuado en el cual resguardar el agua de uso diario, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir una pila en su vivienda y de esta manera cuidar de la sanidad de su hogar.
texts.en:
Patricia is a hardworking woman of 36 years who lives with her husband and her two daughters, ages 12 and 15. Patricia is a seamstress and has been for fifteen years. She has many clients who ask for her services.

Patricia would like to construct a fountain at her home. They are lacking an adequate place to safeguard the water that is for daily use. They are asking for the loan to invest in: cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to construct a fountain at their home and in this manner safeguard the health of their home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, brick and iron to construct a fountain at her house.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is a mother of three who operates a farm growing and selling corn to earn a living. She has been in this business for many years and she earns a good living for her family.

She took a new loan recently from GDMPC micro credit to buy fertilizer and organic pesticides to have an abundant harvest. She plans to expand the farm by having more plots of corn in the future.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer for her corn crops.

loans.name: Juanito

texts.es:
Juanito es un hombre de 22 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia administración.
Él es inteligente, constante y muy constante. Sus estudios los realiza en la zona ‘cruce villa Adela’ zona donde existen conexiones y cruces de calles que conectan a este lugar con las zonas más alejadas de la ciudad.
Juanito es morena de baja estatura y físico delgado, su lengua materna es el Aymará y habla español. Su vida la realiza en compañía de sus padres que trabajan. Él estudia la carrera de administración en un instituto técnico del lugar, se prepara para asumir funciones y responsabilidades en el área contable, financiera y administrativa de pequeñas empresas, “trabajo y estudio tengo todo el tiempo ocupado…” comenta. Paralelamente a sus estudios él trabaja como músico en una banda de música que ameniza fiestas patronales y de grupos folclóricos. La ventaja de sus actividades es que no se cruzan entre sí, la desventaja es la falta de capital para continuar con los estudios. Su sueño es terminar de estudiar y trabajar en su campo, él desea comprar una computadora portátil para terminar de estudiar. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución e3n 2 años que estudia y trabaja.
 Es por esos motivos que Juanito solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil para terminar de estudiar contabilidad.
texts.en:
Juanito, age 22, is single and does not have children. He is studying management. He is intelligent and very tenacious. He carries out his studies in the "Cruce Villa Adela" area, where there are connections and the streets cross to connect this place to the areas outlying the city. Juanito has a dark complexion and is short and thin. His mother tongue is Aymará, and he speaks Spanish. He lives with his parents who work.

He is studying the career of management at a technical institute in the area. He is being prepared to take on functions and responsibilities in the area of accounting, finance, and administration of small businesses. "I work and study, and I am busy all of the time," he says.

In addition to studying he works as a musician in a musical band that plays at patron saint celebrations and for folkloric groups. The advantage of his activities is that they do not interfere with each other. The disadvantage is the lack of capital to continue his studies.

His dream is to finish his education and to work in the field. He wishes to buy a laptop computer to finish his studies. This is the first loan cycle with the institution in the two years that he has been studying and working.

It is for these reasons that Juanito is requesting a loan to buy a laptop computer to finish his accounting studies.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer to complete his accounting studies.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: Roxana es una ama de casa que se visionó como una empresaria independiente en su comunidad ubicada en el municipio de Malambo y cuya idea de negocio nació ante la necesidad de aportar a los gastos del hogar sin descuidar sus obligaciones de madre y esposa, Roxana comenzó hace 10 años a arrendar habitaciones y poco a poco logró reunir algunos ahorros que complementó con recursos de crédito para construir varios apartamentos que hoy arrienda a sus clientes y que le genera un ingreso mensual estable.  Ella es madre de cinco hijos a los que educó con el fruto de su trabajo y el de su cónyuge, en la actualidad Roxana está solicitando su primer credikiva a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el fin de obtener los recursos que requiere para realizar algunas adecuaciones a sus apartamentos. Su sueño de prosperidad es el crecimiento de su negocio y el mejoramiento continuo de su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Roxana is a housewife who envisioned herself as an independent businesswoman in her community located in the municipality of Malambo. Her business idea came about because it was necessary to help with the household expenses without disrupting her duties as a mother and wife.

Ten years ago, Roxana started renting out rooms and little by little she was able to put together her savings, which she complemented with loans, in order to build various apartments that she now rents out to clients and that generate stable monthly earnings.

She is the mother of five children, whom she educated with the fruits of her labour and those of her partner.

Currently, Roxana is requesting her first Kiva loan from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo with the objective of obtaining the recourses necessary to make some renovations to her apartments.

Her dream of prosperity is the growth of her business and the continuous improvement of her quality of life.

loans.use: renovate some of her apartments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to replace the mill that is the principle tool of her trade.

loans.name: Neila Isabel

texts.es: Neila es una microempresaria de 59 años residenciada en Cartagena, un municipio del departamento Bolívar en donde el desayuno de decenas de cartageneros depende de los deliciosos bollos que elabora y que consisten en un envuelto de masa de maíz en hojas de mazorca, que se cocina a fuego de leña en el patio de esta microempresaria.  Neila aprendió a realizar este producto alimenticio cuando ayudaba a sus padres en su elaboración y con el pasar del tiempo decidió iniciar su propio negocio en el que cuenta con 20 años de experiencia. Su proceso productivo inicia con la masa que es preparada el día anterior, la cual deja en reposo para el día siguiente y  cocina los bollos, que a partir de las 6 a.m. están listos para sus comensales.  Para mantener un stock de materias primas está tramitando su primer credikiva con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo el cual comprará maíz esto le permitirá realizar una producción más variada y voluminosa. Ella es madre de cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad y vive en compañía de su cónyuge, gracias a su labor ha ofrecido a su familia bienestar y una mejor calidad de vida, es por ello que aún desea continuar en el negocio más fortalecida y a futuro su meta es adquirir nuevos molinos que respalden su producción.
texts.en:
Neila is a 59 year old small businesswoman who lives in Cartagena. She lives in a municipality in the Bolívar department where the breakfast of dozens of Carthaginians depends upon the delicious 'bollos' [buns made from corn, cassava or potato]. These consist of cornmeal dough wrapped in corn leaves that are cooked over an open wood fire on this small businesswoman's patio.

Neila learned to make this food product when she helped her parents make it. As time passed, she decided to start her own business in that she has 20 years of experience. Her productive process starts with the dough, which is prepared the day before. She lets it rest until the next day, and she cooks the bollos. They are ready for her diners starting at 6:00 a.m.

In order to maintain a stock of raw materials, she is applying for her first Kiva loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the loan to buy corn, which will allow her to make a larger and more varied production.

She has four children, and they are all adults. She lives with her husband. Thanks to her work she has provided for her family's well-being and a better quality of life. That is why she still wishes to continue with a stronger business. Her goal for the future is to get new mills that will support her production.

loans.use: to buy corn, which will allow her to make a larger and more varied production.

loans.name: Carmen Lucrecia

texts.es: CARMEN tiene 21 años de edad ,madre soltera de Hasly de 2 años y de Aylin de 9 meses de edad, vive  con sus hijas, desde el tiempo de 10 meses ha venido trabajando de forma dedicada y comprometida con su pequeña tienda. ya que esta permite que tenga un ingreso para poder pagar el arriendo de la casa y brindar alimentacion a sus hijas, es de esta manera que Carmen tiene un trabajo que le permite estar al cuidado de sus pequeñas , con el crédito desea  mejorar sus ventas  para brindar a futuro una buena educación y poder comprar una casa
texts.en: Carmen is 21 years old, a single mother of two children, Hasly who is 2 years old and Aylin who is 9 months old. Ten months ago, she began working in a dedicated and committed way in a small store. This business has allowed her to earn an income that enables her to pay household expenses and buy food for her children. And so, Carmen's job helps her to be able to care for her children. With this loan, she wants to increase sales by expanding her product selection. Higher sales will mean a higher income she can use to educate her children and purchase a house.

loans.use: purchase stock.

loans.name: Norberto Antonio

texts.es:
Norberto, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a la costura y tienen dos hijos. 

Norberto, tiene años de estar trabajando como motorista, él se encarga de hacer viajes en épocas de corta de caña de azúcar en el ingenio y también hace viajes a personas particulares, además tiene un año y medio trabajando con ganado propio, tiene alrededor de 9 cabezas de ganado y cuenta con el terreno propio donde se manejan. 

Norberto, necesita el préstamo para comprar pasto para alimentar su ganado, porque debido a la sequía se han perdido las cosechas, es por eso que comprará el alimento en otro departamento.  

Los sueños de Norberto, son comprar bastante pasto para que su ganado no pierda peso, porque tiene unas vacas preñadas y otra recién parida.
texts.en:
Norberto is 34 years old. He has a ninth grade education. He is in a relationship, and his partner is a seamstress. They have two children.

Norberto has been working as a driver for years. He makes trips during sugar cane harvest time at the mill, and he also offers transportation to individuals.

He has also been taking care of his own livestock for the last year and a half. He has about 9 head of cattle, and owns the land on which he keeps them.

Norberto needs the loan to buy grass to feed his cattle, because due to the drought, the harvests have been lost. This is why he wants to buy feed from another department.

Norberto's dream is to buy enough grass so that his cattle do not lose weight, because he has some that are pregnant, and another who has just given birth.

loans.use: to buy feed for his livestock.

loans.name: Farhat

texts.en:
Farhat is 51 years old and married. She is a vigorous lady and for many years has been running a business purchasing and selling cloth.

She buys various fabrics in different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business.

Now, Farhat has requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan. Farhat expects a boost in her earnings with the loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business.

loans.name: Roder

texts.es:
Roder con 43 años de edad,de estado civil casado,vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, departamento de Lambayeque,país Perú. Roder cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.

Roder se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, como leche, aceite, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, artículos de aseo, etc. Cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia en el rubro, su negocio está ubicado en su mismo domicilio. solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo, compra de más mercadería, dicha inversión le servirá para incrementar sus ventas, con gran influencia en el negocio. Roder piensa tener mayor stock de productos para poder atender las diversas necesidades, requerimientos y gustos de los pobladores de la zona.

Roder es socio recurrente en nuestra institución Edpyme Alternativa. Roder a tenido tres créditos de 1000,00; 1000,00 y 1000,00 los cuáles los ha pagado de manera puntual. Desde que se convirtió en socio de nosotros, su negocio ha mejorado y su calidad de vida de igual forma.
texts.en:
Roder, age 43, is married and lives with his wife and children in the district of Oyotun, in the province of Chiclayo, in the state of Lambayeque, Peru. Roder has very good references, both personal and professional from people in the area.


Roder sells groceries, such as milk, oil, rice, sugar, sodas and toiletries. He has more than ten years of experience in the business. His business is located in his home. He is asking for the loan as working capital. He will purchase more merchandise. This inversion will help him to increase his sales and will have a great influence on the business. Roder plans to have better supplies to be able to tend to the diverse needs, requirements and likes of the people in the area.


Roder is a return partner of Edpyme Alternativa. Roder has had three loans of 1,000 each which he has paid back in a timely fashion. Since he became our partner, his business has improved and his quality of life has also.

loans.use: to have working capital and purchase more merchandise.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa, de 57 años de edad, no estudio, pero sabe firmar y vive junto a sus 2 nietos menores edad que se encuentran estudiando. 
 
Josefa, tiene un cafetín que atiende junto a una de sus hijas, que le apoya con la administración del negocio; ella tiene 12 años de ejercer dicha actividad, ella inicio como ayudante y luego se independizó y ese ha sido el medio de subsistencia de su familia. 

Josefa, necesita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, frijoles, aceite, azúcar, etc.
  
Josefa, tiene como objetivo, tener un negocio que sea rentable, para la sostenibilidad de su familia y para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellos.
texts.en:
Josefa is 57 years old, she never went to school, but she can sign her name. She lives with her two small grandchildren who both attend school.

Josefa as a cafeteria that she runs with one of her daughters, who helps her with the administrative side of the business. Josefa has run this business for 12 years. She began as an assistant and now she owns the business. Her work here has been the main source of income for her family.

Josefa needs a loan in order to purchase things like rice, beans, oil and sugar etc.

Josefa's goal is to have a business that brings in sufficient income to support her family and to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: purchase rice, beans, oil and sugar.

loans.name: José Teofilo

texts.es:
Don José tiene 57 años y 6 hijos de 35, 33, 30, 25, 23 y 21 años, ademas tiene 15 años en el negocio de la tara, ha comprobado que utilizando abono la tara produce más, es por eso que le gustaría mejorar su cultivo abonanado con abono orgánico, para lo cual necesita un crédito para comprar abono y poder incrementar su producción y generar mejores ingresos para su familia.
Sus expectativas a futuro son la crianza de ganado y mejorar su vivienda familiar, utilizando para ello los ingresos que le proporciona la tara.
texts.en: Mr. José is 57 years old and has 6 children aged 35, 33, 30, 25, 23, and 21. He has 15 years of experience in the tara (indigenous Peruvian plant) business. It has been found that using tara fertilizer produces more, and because of this, he would like to improve his harvest with organic fertilizer. For this he needs a loan to buy fertilizer to increase his production to have greater earnings for his family. His hopes for the futures are to raise cattle and improve his family home using the earnings from producing tara.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer to grow tara (indigenous Peruvian plant)

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Rafael de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la ojalateria desde hace 10 años con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para mejorar su vivienda remodelando el servicio sanitario, pero como no posee suficiente capital por eso solicita un credito para la compra de materiales de construccion y asi poder tener un lugar mas limpio.
texts.en:
Rafael, who is 53 years old, lives in his own house with his family group. He has worked as a tinsmith for 10 years. With what he obtains from his work, he manages to pay some of the expenses of his household.

He is applying for a loan to improve his house by remodeling the sanitary service, but as he doesn't have sufficient capital, he is applying for a loan to purchase construction materials and thus be able to have a cleaner place.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Yolmer

texts.es:
Yolmer con 28 años de edad,vive en casa propia de material rústico, vive junto a su cónyuge y dos hijos, en el distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, departamento de Cajamarca, país Perú.La vida en el distrito es tranquila. Yolmer cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona.Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Yolmer se dedica al es el cultivo de café, contando a la fecha con 1 ha. Variedad catimor resistente a enfermedades y plagas, plantación esta en segundo año de producción tiene cuatro años de edad, cultiva café en caserío Palma Central, distrito Santo Tomas. Se dedica hace 4 años al cultivo de café, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro del cultivo de café porque anteriormente a cultivado variedad nacional y ahora cultiva catimor. Adicionalmente se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores (gallinas, cuyes, chanchos y otros) y cultivo de productos de pan llevar (yuca, plátano, viticas, menestras y otros).El préstamo que se le otorgará será para mantenimiento y cultivo de 1 ha. De café en producción, asegurando una buena producción para campaña 2016, reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.

Yolmer es socio recurrente en nuestra institución, Edpyme Alternativa. Yolmer firma con cónyuge.
texts.en:
Yolmer, 28, lives in his own house made of rustic material. He lives with his partner and two children in the Santo Tomás province of Cutervo, in the area of Cajamarca, Perú.
Life in the area is calm. Yolmer has good personal and professional references from people in the area. Most people in the area work in agriculture, commerce and livestock.

Yolmer grows Catimore type coffee which is resistant to disease and pests. HIs plantation is in its second year of production and the crop is 4 years old. He grows coffee in the village of Palma Central in the Santo Tomas district.
He has been growing coffee for the past 4 years. He has experience in cultivating coffee as previously he grew the national variety and now he grows the catimor variety. He also grows and sells small animals (chickens, guinea pigs, pigs etc). as well as sells food products (cassava, plantains, beans etc).

The loan will be used to maintain the 1 hectar coffee crop. From the current coffee crop he is sure he will have a good 2016 with a larger sales volume allowing for a larger income in order to improve the quality of life of his family.

Yolmer is a recurring member of out institution: Edpyme Alternativa. He signs with his partner.

loans.use: to maintain the 1 hectar coffee crop.

loans.name: Deisy

texts.es:
Deisy, de 39 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos que se dedican a la pesca y a comercializarlo en la misma zona.

Deisy, junto a su familia siempre se han dedicado a la pesca y este pescado lo obtienen del mar que esta cerca de su casa y es de ese negocio que perciben ingresos para suplir las necesidades familiares.				

Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar más redes de pesca, para tener más pescado, porque la demanda es mayor y quieren dar abasto a todos sus clientes y de esa manera obtener mejores ganancias. 

Los sueños de Deisy, son comprar una lancha propia con motor incluido y más redes para poder tener mejores ingresos y tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Deisy, 39, studied through 6th grade. She lives with her husband and two children. They earn a living through fishing and selling it in the same area.

Deisy, along with her family has always worked in fishing. They fish in the ocean close to their home. This is how they earn enough income to support the family.

She needs a loan to buy more fishing nets in order to get more fish as the demand has grown and they want to serve all their clients and in this way increase their profits.

Deisy's dreams are to buy her own boat with an engine and more nets in order to have a better income and have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to buy more fishing nets.

loans.name: Penina

texts.en: Penina is 49 years old with 5 children. She operates a business of selling banana and taro in her community to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. Penina requested for a loan to buy backpack sprayer, banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals, chainsaw, to assist her run the business. She joined SPBD in 2011, and hopes to use her business profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy backpack sprayer, banana tube(seedling), taro roots(seedling), wheelbarrow, water tank, hand gloves, rake, shovel, chemicals, chainsaw,

loans.name: Guillermo Antonio

texts.es: Guillermo es un hombre trabajador que a sus 51 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañera de vida y sus 3 hijos de 27, 23 y 20 años de edad y un nieto. Guillermo se dedica a prestar sus servicios en una casa comercial, además vende cuadros decorativos lo que le permite obtener muy buenos ingresos económicos. Guillermo logro construir el servicio sanitario de su vivienda con el apoyo del crédito anterior y gracias a su buena experiencia solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento arena y grava para encementar el piso de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Guillermo, 51, is a hard working man who lives in his own home with his partner and 3 children aged 27,23 and 20 as well as a grandchild.

Guillermo works at a mall and also sells decorative paintings which allows him to have a good income.
Guillermo was able to build a toilet in his house with the help of his last loan.

He is now requesting another loan through FUSAU to invest in: cement, sand and gravel to lay down a floor cement in his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to lay down a floor cement in his house.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a widowed woman with five children one of whom attend school. She lives in her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a milk selling business for the past two years, selling to the neighbors.She mentioned a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

With the loan she is requesting she wants to purchase a stock of milk for resale.She decided to join yehu to access loans and boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of milk for resale

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Mrs Oanh is 35 years old and she is married. She has been working in agriculture raising poultry for more than 10 years.Oanh lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.
Her family is a low-income household in village, moreover the income from this business is not high enough to do what she really needs to comfort her life.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.
This is Oanh first loan with Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. She hopes that this loan could make her little dream come true.
In the future, Oanh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a new toilet.

loans.name: Rukuni

texts.en:
Rukuni, 42, lives in her own humble home made of daub and wattle in a small village in Bolangir district. She has lived there for a number of years with her husband and their two daughters, ages 12 and 14.

Rukuni works as a tailor in the community and provides quality service to a large customer base. This is how she has been able to support the household finances. Rukuni is well known by her neighbors for being an honest and hardworking woman.

Rukuni is requesting a loan of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum to buy sand, cement, a flush toilet, steel, and other materials to build a septic system so that she can provide her family with better hygiene. She hopes to be able to rely on this loan, because she wants to do this project as soon as possible so that she can provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, a flush toilet, steel, and other materials to build a septic system.

loans.name: Kamene

texts.en:
Kamene is a married woman and has four school going children. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees for the family.

For the past three years, she has operated a business of buying and selling livestock, selling at the market to local neighbours. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and high cost of transportation in his place of operation.

With the loan, that he is requesting, she wants to purchase goats and cows for resale. She decided to join Yehu o access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase goats and cows for resale

loans.name: Aiga

texts.en: Aiga is a Samoan citizen, she is 66 years old with 8 children and still strong and fit to run her convenience store in her village to earn a living. Aiga requested for a loan to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, box of sausage and plastic bags, to assist her run the business. She has been doing this for more than 4 years. She became a member of SPBD in 2008.

loans.use: to buy a sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, box of tinned fish, box of vegetable oil, box of milk, box of sausage and plastic bags,

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en: Mahmoud is a 27-year-old single man from Rafah city, which is located in the Gaza Strip. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. Mahmoud also has a grocery store where he sells basic grocery products. He took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new refrigerator for his grocery store. With this loan, Mahmoud can buy more cold drinks for his store to resell, which are popular because Gaza can get very hot! Mahmoud appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new refrigerator for his grocery store

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en:
Mwanasiti is married with two school going children. They live at their own house that neither has electricity but nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

She has operated a Khanga ( women wrap cloth) selling business, selling from home and door to door to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.
With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of Khanga’s for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of Khanga’s for resale.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a married woman and owns a house that has piped water but not electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

Chizi has operated a tailoring business for the past three years. She makes women suits and men suits. Her potential clients are ladies and gents. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 she wants to purchase cloth materials, sewing thread for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to improve her business

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials, sewing thread for her business

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en:
Mejumaa  is a married woman with five children, all of whom attends school. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past eight years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of transportation in her business.

With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a married woman with four children, none of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past ten years, selling household consumables like wheat flour and maize flour. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.
With the loan, she is requesting she wants to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Gloria Amparo

texts.en:
Gloria is 55 years old and lives in the municipality of Frontino. Her family used to run a business for many years that now belongs to this woman who has worked really hard to keep with the tradition and to improve it. She is the owner of a farm where there’re different products growing, especially coffee.

Since 1990 she’s been working hard so she can provide for her family and to accomplish some goals, like make his growing bigger and make the business last in time. She’s asking for a loan so she can buy inputs, pay for some administration’s costs and buy more coffee seeds. 

Glorias’s father was the one who introduced her to the business, so she’s very thankful and hopes she can keep supporting her family. She also would like to improve the conditions of her house. You can help Gloria to achieve all her goals, a loan will get her much closer to accomplish it.

loans.use: buy inputs, pay for some administration’s costs and buy more coffee seeds

loans.name: Saraswati

texts.en:
Saraswati, 36, lives in her own humble home made of daub and wattle in a small village in Bolangir district. She has lived there for a number of years with her husband and their two sons, ages 6 and 10.

Saraswati works as a grocer in the community and provides quality service to a large customer base. This is how she has been able to support the household finances. Saraswati is well known by her neighbors for being an honest and hardworking woman.

Saraswati is requesting a loan of 15,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum to buy a commode and to build a septic system so that she can provide her family with better hygiene. She hopes to be able to rely on this loan, because she wants to do this project as soon as possible so that she can provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a commode and to build a septic system.

loans.name: Saeeda

texts.en: Saeeda  is 54 years old working woman. After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition. So she started a business of selling cloth. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and their education. Saeeda  is famous among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. Currently she needs a loan of 40000 PKR  to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment

loans.name: Mkambe

texts.en:
Mkambe is a married woman with five children, none of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

She has operated a retail shop business for the past five years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business.

Mkambe decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour to sell.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour to sell.

loans.name: Mwaka

texts.en:
Mwaka is a married woman with two kids, one of whom attends school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mwaka operates a grocery stall selling vegetables. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of seasonality in her place of operation.

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. With the KES 30,000, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Bahati

texts.en:
Bahati is a married woman. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly has electricity. 

For the past one year, she has operated a coconut selling business, selling to local neighbors. She faces a major challenge of seasonality and high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding to improve her living standards. 

With the Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Maria Balbina

texts.es:
